text: hwla' almunafiqun hum aladhin qedu waqaluu li'iikhwanihim aladhin 'usibuu mae almuslimin fi hrbhm almushrikin yawm "'uhd": law ataeana hwla' ma qtlu. qul lahum -ayha alrswl-: fadfaeuu ean 'anfusikum almawt 'iin kuntum sadiqin fi dewakm 'anahum law ataewkm ma qtlu, wa'anakum qad njwtm minh bqewdkm ean alqtal
